website_summaries.verdict: No additives and endures rigorous testing expected of a trusted brand.
pros: Customers like the small pill size that's easy to swallow
Can aid in relieving the effects of migraines and muscle cramps
We love the high standard of quality control that comes with each bottle
cons: Pills may taste a bit chalky

customer_reviews.title: Sciatic nerve success
customer_reviews.text: My mother called me a genius after I sent her some of this to help with sciatica. She has a disc in her back out of place. Claims she hasn’t felt this good in 15 years. Started with 2 pills twice daily and is now down to 2 pills evening only. In her words, she’s forgotten what it has felt like to not be in pain until she started taking this. I hope this natural medicine works for you too! If this review was helpful please mark it as so.
customer_reviews.author: Max B.

customer_reviews.title: I feel better, and more energetic
customer_reviews.text: My mood in general has shifted enormously since starting to take magnesium daily; I feel better, and more energetic. The pills are a little tough to swallow though; it's more of a 'wideness' issue. If they were longer they'd be easier to swallow (giggity?).
customer_reviews.author: Annie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dose for me
customer_reviews.text: 250mg is perfect for a 5"4' 125lb girl. The 500mg I think almost killed me. We are all on the keto diet and this keeps everything moving and the toilet paper company in business as well
customer_reviews.author: kinch

customer_reviews.title: Helped with migranes.
customer_reviews.text: This was suggested by my doctor to help with migranes, and it has really reduced migranes for me.
customer_reviews.author: SunShine

customer_reviews.title: not good to take more than that without your doctor's advice
customer_reviews.text: Works for me and helps my arthritis. Just one in the AM, not good to take more than that without your doctor's advice. As with all over the counter's, be careful and make sure your doctor/s know.
customer_reviews.author: C. Patchell

customer_reviews.title: this stuff w/o the citrate works great, really helps my IBS-C
customer_reviews.text: Magnesium with citrate irritates my stomach/acid reflux, this stuff w/o the citrate works great, really helps my IBS-C. Has kinda been the key for if not curing, very much managing that. That and probiotics!
customer_reviews.author: Lovelea79

customer_reviews.title: Great product and I think good dosage
customer_reviews.text: I had been taking a 500MG supplement for Magnesium but then started reading about the horrible problems of having too much magnesium in your diet. I downgraded to this 250MG dosage and it seems to be the perfect fit. A great product, all natural, and it really does wonders for muscle tension and my anxiety specifically. Very affordable, I keep a bottle at home and at the office in case I miss my morning dose when I'm heading out the door. Was packaged well, sealed, and looks like it came from a store shelf!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel BosticTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a better poop in my life. Works awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Xoch Barr

customer_reviews.title: Cured my leg cramps!
customer_reviews.text: I suffered multiple leg cramps over night, every night for yearts. Took calcium magnesium capsules before bed in the last few months and this helped but did not eliminate the leg cramps. I would wake up with a terrible leg cramps though anyway at least once a night and have to spray my cramped muscle with magnesium spray which worked in about 5 minutes. However, once I started taking one of these tablets before bed at night NO CRAMPS at all! First time in 5 years,no cramps! These work and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cnmn

customer_reviews.title: WRONG INGREDIENTS LISTED ONLINE
customer_reviews.text: I looked extensively for a good magnesium supplement and ordered these, the ingredients online in these photos are NOT the same as the ones I recieved. Theres a whole list of garabge in them including polysorbate 80! What is the point of this!? Wish I could return these.
customer_reviews.author: corey johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for my Depression and Anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I take these in combination with a P5P supplement and my daily multivitamin. I deal with depression and anxiety, and this seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Dawn Bradley

customer_reviews.title: I love Nature Made
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand for a magnesium product. I have bought it for a couple of years of now. I was glad to find it on Amazon for the convenience of ordering it when I need it and getting it quickly with PRIME. They are in tablet form which I prefer because you don't have to wait for a capsule to dissolve.
customer_reviews.author: Nick1177

customer_reviews.title: horrible stomach cramps, gas, diarrhea...
customer_reviews.text: Jeeze, that was horrible! I only took one pill last night with dinner and woke up with severe diarrhea, stomach cramps and gas. You don't even wanna leave the house. Here is a little info about Magnesium Oxide: commonly used therapeutically as a laxative and relief for acid reflux. This type of magnesium shows high levels of concentration, but POOR LEVELS of bioavailability (only 4%).
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: I have far fewer headaches
customer_reviews.text: Thank you magnesium for helping make my headaches go away! I have only had one headache since taking this along with a new allergy medicine. It's been life changing!
customer_reviews.author: smurph017

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if it works, but I've not had any negative side effects
customer_reviews.text: Just trying to feel better overall as a whole, so I adopted the Keto diet and read somewhere that magnesium was an important addition, so I purchased this product. Whether it's one thing or the other or perhaps a combo of all things I've been doing this past month, I'm no longer falling asleep at the office mid-day, so that alone will keep me taking this product as I have each morning with my shake.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Superpowers in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: The day I started taking this supplement, I was amazed at my energy level-for the first time,I wasn't looking for coffee at 2:00! I felt superhuman! Muscles are relaxed, tension melted away, I sleep well. No negative side effects with...ahem...digestion. Maybe because the dose is low (250), which is what's recommended to start. I'm telling everyone to try this!
customer_reviews.author: pencilskirt

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Starting taking because my dr said it will help with migraines.. and I have noticed I’m getting less and less severe.. taking 1 time daily..
customer_reviews.author: Michele C Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great health benefits
customer_reviews.text: Who knew that low magnesium could cause so many health issues. I feel like a new person!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This supplement has been life changing for me! Consider ...
customer_reviews.text: This supplement has been life changing for me! Consider asking your doctor if your symptoms could be a magnesium deficiency. This helps with my nervous system disorder.
customer_reviews.author: Bexb

customer_reviews.title: Pregnancy/postpartum
customer_reviews.text: Used for pregnancy and postpartum hormone management and noticed an improved mood.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Decent tablet
customer_reviews.text: Helped to get my magnesium (and b12 due to added absorption) levels up to normal levels within a half a year, since i have major deficiencies due to Hashimoto's thyroiditis. Doesnt really help with any of my nerve problems, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: miri

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These help my postpartum anxiety/moods a lot. This and fish oil
customer_reviews.author: mgs

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand of magnesium supplement
customer_reviews.text: I take a magnesium supplement at my neurologist’s direction for restless leg syndrome and constipation due to Parkinson’s Disease. I have tried other brands and I like the Nature Made supplement. It is easy to swallow, easily absorbed - blood work shows that my body absorbs it well. I order this product every 3 months and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: reiki_pixie

customer_reviews.title: helping me...
customer_reviews.text: taking this at bed time helping with my migraines and body aches and allowing me to sleep better almost been taking it a few weeks and can feel a positive affect!
customer_reviews.author: Nina R.

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a recommendation from my neurologist that it could help reduce my migraines. I do 2 pills a day for the last two months and have noticed a difference. You do have to take consistently and for at least a month to get results. My wife even commented that there's been a change and she's a huge skeptic of... everything. Bonus if you're someone who has sensitive BMs. I found this helped regulate me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Helps
customer_reviews.text: I have had severe leg cramps. I was already taking potassium but my doctor suggested magnesium. So far so good with no leg cramps.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Farooqui

customer_reviews.title: I was having trouble getting to sleep and not feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble getting to sleep and not feeling up to par so I added this and few other things to my supplements regimen. I take one magnesium pill in the evening and surprise, I am asleep in ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Wadlington

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed after taking these for the past week that my RLS symptoms have diminished. Super helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Al Mc

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with swallowing issues
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a good product and is exactly the kind you want to take for nerve / muscle function issues but.... if you (like me) have Achalasia or another condition that causes swallowing issues, this is not the one. I bought them thinking they would be small enough to swallow but the pill is half as thick as it is wide. And... they just crumble in a pill splitter. If you have some esophageal peristalsis you might be fine but if, like me, you have zero, look for chewables or a liquid instead. :)
customer_reviews.author: TerriS

customer_reviews.title: Great for Ménière’s and other vestibular disorders
customer_reviews.text: This has greatly cut back the tinnitus and I believe has helped prevent any hearing loss which is very common for Ménière’s. The price of nature made is always great and the product is worth so much more. Highly recommend for any ear problems/conditions. You won’t regret it. Buy it now
customer_reviews.author: Momto4

customer_reviews.title: If you want a laxative, it will totally serve you!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my pregnancy-related calf and foot spasms, hoping to sleep better at night. It worked pretty well for that with some consistent use. However, I noticed I'd have a touch of the runs every morning after. Being pregnant and typically constipated, I was compelled to check out the ingredients just in case. Now, magnesium already relaxes smooth muscles, so Im not sure WHY IN THE BLEEP polyethylene glycol (aka miralax) is listed in the ingredients! Just keep this in mind. I stopped taking it, sadly. Will have to find a new magnesium supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: This product stopped  my muscle  spasms.
customer_reviews.text: After neck surgery I was getting severe muscle spasms in the neck. I did some reading and found a large percentage of the population is magnesium deficient. One of the symptoms is muscle spasms. It's been approximately four weeks since I started taking this supplement and have not had any spasms.
customer_reviews.author: Joe West

customer_reviews.title: Works when I can't sleep
customer_reviews.text: Friend recommended that when I can't sleep to try magnesium. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Yeraldin

customer_reviews.title: Contains Laxative!
customer_reviews.text: My stomach has been so upset recently so I started looking into anything different I've been doing/eating and the only thing is taking these magnesium pills. I wish I had read all of the bad reviews before purchasing. Especially those mentioning that there is polyethylene glycol (a laxative) in it. I have had diarrhea and stomach cramps for a week straight. BEWARE. Only buying my vitamins and herbal supplements from Whole Foods for now on. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for Fatigue and sored Muscles
customer_reviews.text: For many months l have been suffering from fatigue of leg muscle and feet after standing for not long hours. I thought l am having vitD deficiency so took supplement but didn't work. On my annual check up my doctor said l might be deficient in magnesium so take it's supplement. I started this and in 2-3 days l started feeling better energy and less tiredness. Legs muscles are not as sore. And neither are back muscles having spasm as much. In less than a week it has made so much difference so l am hopeful that I will be back to my original self soon. Will update if it seems to not have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Definite help for headaches
customer_reviews.text: Suffer with constant Migraine headaches, my doctor recommended Magnesium & B2 as a help with headaches and it really is helping!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Richgels

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin supplement and the Name Brand has always worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins no mater the different kinds are all the best brand I have found! From time to time I need some vitamins that my doctor tells me to get that I am in need of especially if you don’t always eat as the dietary scale says and personal I love this brand cause it has always worked great for me and they are as reasonable as and I have seen. I think in the past they have been out of what I need to take and may pickup another brand but this is my favorite brand and I always come back to getting this vitamin from Nature Made!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for leg and finger cramps
customer_reviews.text: I take 2 per day, and it does a great job preventing Charlie horses in my calves during the night. My fingers tend to cramp up when I am cooking or baking, and this is the one supplement that seems to prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Levy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: These pills are a little thick but they are still easy to swallow. There isn't any taste, after taste or bad smell which aides in the ease of swallowing them. Next time I will get the higher dose so I don't have to take 2 a day but that was misjudgment on my part and no fault to the product.
customer_reviews.author: ratsmik

customer_reviews.title: Great low dose product!
customer_reviews.text: Had bad migraines and food sensitivities. A holistic health doctor suggested magnesium and said my symptoms were a sign of a deficiency. I’ve been taking a low dose, once a day for years. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Tlamb

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: So far has helped me sleep very well along with melatonin
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Good for migraine sufferers
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these help with migraines they say if you take magnesium you can help and I'm here to say that is true I'm take to a night I can take two when a migraine is starting and it can actually get rid of a migraine or at least ease it
customer_reviews.author: Tarah

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of my muscle cramps
customer_reviews.text: My neck and upper shoulders are so tight and painful even when I do exercises. When I started taking this magnesium , the pain and muscle tightness went away and I have not changed anything else in my diet or daily activities.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jean Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Probably the smallest magnesium out there
customer_reviews.text: There is no such thing as a tiny magnesium pill, by their nature they have to be bulky, but as magnesium goes these are smaller than most. Slightly wider in diameter than an M&M candy, and also thicker. This form of magnesium is supposed to be one of the less easily absorbable ones, so I was skeptical, but I feel noticeable effects from it so I'm happy. And unlike the massive horse pills that the "easily absorbable" magnesium comes in, taking these isn't a chore, so I'm far more likely to do it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: The problem as I can see is that we don't know if the leg cramps would be worse without the tablets
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this all the time. It is supposed to help curb leg cramps. Don't know if it really helps as he still gets some. The problem as I can see is that we don't know if the leg cramps would be worse without the tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleep aid.
customer_reviews.text: Two of these every night about 30 minutes before bed help me fall asleep and stay asleep. Every night!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered, literally
customer_reviews.text: The doctor advised my diabetic, stroke-surviving husband to take magnesium, and this was the best deal we could find.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Hankel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of these pills, small and easy to swallow
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: I can't say they work miracles, but I definitely think they help.
customer_reviews.text: I had heard of the importance of magnesium for the body and the lack of this in our diet, this was the reason I bought this supplement. I cannot speak of miracles done by these pills since I started taking them at the same time that I reactivated in the exercises, but that I feel better is undoubted. At the moment I think that the extra magnesium influences my good feeling since I have not found it heavy to resume the exercises and the truth is that I feel that my thoughts come slightly more clearly than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Horrible poos
customer_reviews.text: My dr told me to get a Mag Supplement so I chose these for the price. Took one pill and 20 minutes later I was on the toilet dying. I thought I was giving birth to a baby poop it was that bad !!! When I mentioned this to my dr he said it was a side effect for some people. From now on im just eating a banana or two.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne and Sara

customer_reviews.title: Knock you out in a few min
customer_reviews.text: It works. I’m on keto. And I have a tough time sleeping. Because from all that energy still in me. Pop These puppies in before bed, will do the trick. I tell you that much.
customer_reviews.author: peteyrocks17

customer_reviews.title: These caused a belly ache and diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Watch these things have polyethylene glycol in them, Miralax, you'll be on the pot a lot
customer_reviews.author: John C Smith Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin to take daily
customer_reviews.text: This vitamin should be added to everyones daily vitamin regiment. There is so many benefits to this vitamin. I have migraines and magnesium definitely helps, so if you suffer from migraines, I would definitely try taking one daily for 30 days to see if they improve.
customer_reviews.author: Candra Lessing

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great to prevent leg and foot cramps at night
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnessium tabs
customer_reviews.text: At the last doctor's visit, I was asked why I started taking this and I said it looked like something I needed, my doctor agreed with me and told me to continue taking it.
customer_reviews.author: movie lover

customer_reviews.title: Great For Relieving Muscle Cramps
customer_reviews.text: I was consistently getting muscle cramps in my legs and feet that would wake me up at night after working out earlier in the day. After some research I considered a magnesium deficiency as the cause. I take one of these daily and the night time muscle cramps have disappeared. So glad it was a simple, low-cost solution!
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Not the kind of magnesium you want (probably)
customer_reviews.text: Took one tablet before bed about an hour after eating a big meal, and less than 10 minutes later I have horrible stomach pains and the sh*ts. Now that I’m doing more research it seems that this is all magnesium oxide is good for!
customer_reviews.author: Jill L.

customer_reviews.title: Nature Made Magnesium has made me feel better all around.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't felt this good for years. I have many major illnesses which no medication seemed to help. After about 2 weeks of taking one pill a day I began to feel much better and way less tired. I would highly recommend this product to anyone with health issues or for just general nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic headaches, like, 4-5 times a week normally. I started taking one of these pills every morning with breakfast and WOW. I can tell a difference. In the past two weeks, I have had to take headache relief medication ONCE. I wish I had learned about magnesium helping headaches years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Dallin & Heather

customer_reviews.title: They're supposed to give you a better sleep. Maybe it's just a placebo
customer_reviews.text: Yup, these are magnesium tablets. They're supposed to give you a better sleep. Maybe it's just a placebo, but it seems like it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my leg, feet and hand cramps.
customer_reviews.text: I have body cramps, especially leg, feet and hands as neuropathy from type 1 diabetes. I tried bananas, vinegar, mustard, and all the other remedies thrown at me. This magnesium seems to help the most. I can take one when the cramping starts and usually within 20 minutes, I get relief.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Helps restore body
customer_reviews.text: These magnesium supplements are recommended for daily intake if your body has gone under a traumatic experience, or any intensive treatments. This will help strengthen you from inside out. Easy to swallow, good for muscles, heart and bones. An organic and light diet is a important counterpart.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Works for eyelid twitches!
customer_reviews.text: My eye was twitching like crazy all day - it was even difficult for me to drive. I took this and 40 min later...no twitch. Super effective. Totally recommend for twitching eyelids!
customer_reviews.author: laal

customer_reviews.title: Really made my legs feel better
customer_reviews.text: I'm not getting the odd cramps anymore at night. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Must try especially if you're older and feeling sluggish
customer_reviews.text: Been taking this for a few months now I got to say it's really made a difference in my health. I definitely feel like I have much more energy and my wife has noticed the same thing. I suffer from neuropathy and other health issues which drags me down and this really was a great pick me up.
customer_reviews.author: NhscanDotCom

customer_reviews.title: Nature Made Magnesium (Oxide) 250 mg Tablets
customer_reviews.text: The Natural Made Magnesium tables were very easy to swallow and were also at a good price. Will be making another purchase when these get close to running out.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product which really helps give my body the nutrient it needs. The only thing I would prefer is if it was in gel capsule form as the tablet makes it just a little less easy to swallow, but not impossible. Easily absorbs into the system/body. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I take Magnesium 250mg twice a day to help with my pain and the pain medication I take. It works great! Also helps with Bodily function, of course!
customer_reviews.author: Jamee Lang

customer_reviews.title: Whoops
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were Manganese when I bought them, but alas. I still use them and I like the effect they have.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca F.

customer_reviews.title: Magnesium is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: Magnesium helps with my anxiety , its all natural and mellows me out a lot when I am stressed. I also take it when I am on my period as well. Magnesium is accessible, this brand is really great for me and the dosage is just enough.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Backer

customer_reviews.title: Great for your aching joints
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy, I wake up my joints aren't so sore. You won't feel the difference until after about taking it for a week
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Take 2 an hour before bed each night.. helps me relax and sleep well. Highly recommend - this have been a game changer for me!
customer_reviews.author: Andra D.

customer_reviews.title: I feel normal again
customer_reviews.text: I liked the purpose of Magnesium and I feel like its balanced out what was missing in my body.
customer_reviews.author: Golfnifecenc

customer_reviews.title: Folic Acid sent instead as if its identical to Magnesium Oxide
customer_reviews.text: Can't return it. Don't want it. I want Magnesium Oxide in a bottle as advertised that says Magnesium Oxide. Not a bottle with a sticker on the side that says Folic Acid is the substitute for Magnesium Oxide. Tried to Google if they are the same thing without any definitive answer except most likely not. I'll just buy what I want in the store and not online.
customer_reviews.author: PolarPro

customer_reviews.title: Magnesium is great for so many things!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these several times and love them! I take them daily to help with my headaches and other body aches. Magnesium is great for so many other things too! These are easy to swallow and very inexpensive. Definitely will be ordering again when I get low.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Wischler

customer_reviews.title: Nature Made Magnesium Tablets
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was properly sealed and arrived in good condition. Never doubted the Nature Made quality.
customer_reviews.author: stan the man

customer_reviews.title: Tablet check✔️
customer_reviews.text: I mean it what I ordered but I ordered the 100 tablets not 10 tablets, someone or something was asleep when handling this bottle😂
customer_reviews.author: AlmaStarr

customer_reviews.title: Chemo destroy your bones too ?
customer_reviews.text: Read some on this product and decided to try this to relieve some of the bone pain left from awesome chemo. I take it at night and kinda makes me sleepy and seems to work although I am not a doctor just plays dress up from time to time
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Muscle Spasms
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with muscle spasems so I decided something needed to be done. I read taking magnesium would help so I decided to try Nature Made magnesium and within 2 weeks no more spasms. I will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Glorybee

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Small but the round shape still makes it hard to swallow. I’ll have to cut these in half too. I’m really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JBF

customer_reviews.title: Doctor recommended I try this in addition to current therapy
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my doctor. Helps with muscle / back problems
customer_reviews.author: tommy e parker

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can’t tell if these are working or something else I’m doing, but they aren’t bothersome and I do feel like they add to my overall good health. I’ve been told they are good for regularity and cramps. Still testing them out.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Added these to my supplement routine and haven't noticed any differences just yet but they are easy to take and I'm hopeful they'll help out with general feelings of rest and wellness.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Helped with so many of my ailments!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking magnesium every other day for a month now and I feel noticeable effects on my mood and sleep as well as having better recovery from working out and less muscle tightness. I started taking it to sleep better and it has made a huuuuge difference! The first week I took it, I sleep 9 hours every night and felt very rested. Way better than any sleep meds out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Runners
customer_reviews.text: Got this pill because my doctor said I needed more magnesium after extreme cramping during runs. It really helped because I don’t get cramping anymore. The pills are easy to swallow and they don’t taste like anything which is good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement!
customer_reviews.text: My neurologist recommended that I take magnesium as a supplement for my migraine headaches, as some people with migraines are deficient in magnesium. This has been great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Placebo effect?
customer_reviews.text: I really feel this gives me a boost of natural energy. Not for long, but it doesn't get me anxious like caffeine.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Traish

customer_reviews.title: Yikes don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Caused diarrhea every time I took it. Prior to this, I was taking a higher dose of a different brand and I didn’t have any stomach issues. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins were tampered with, only contained 18
customer_reviews.text: This item is advertised to have 100 tablets, but when I received it, it only contained 18. It also appeared that the seal on the bottle had been removed and then replaced. I didn’t take any of the vitamins because I was worried they had been tampered with.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: They don't have a flavor that I can tell. I take take them because of the keto diet. My magnesium levels were low. They are also good for helping you go #2 which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price And I will probably buy more of this product
customer_reviews.author: Ted A. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Manageable pill size
customer_reviews.text: Pill size is reasonable, there isn't much of an "easy swallow" coating on these, so you may have problems if you need that kind of coating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item as described; quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: This supplement is not meant for pain relief. Rather it is recommended by my physician due to Magnesium lack and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Pat KM

customer_reviews.title: To hard to swollow
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time swollening pills.Magneizium is good but thick and chalky to swallow.I changed to something that dissolves in mouth.I use for sleeping.Works good.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Goodin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and inexpensive product and I order it offend. It helps with bowl movements and I'm able to go every morning..
customer_reviews.author: Willgo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been working in the healthcare industry for many years and I started seeing the signs with my own body that I was magnesium deficient. I used to have random muscle spasms on a rather frequent basis and after just one day of taking this supplement, the spasms stopped, and I noticed a huge improvement in body function. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Good deal and subscriptions make life easy
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that these pills were replenished on time and that I will never have bottles upon bottles waiting to expire.
customer_reviews.author: Byron D.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the size of these pills. Didn't upset my stomach even taking them on an empty one. Happy with the price and purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: This did the trick
customer_reviews.text: A blood test revealed my wifes magnesium level was low. After taking the amount recommended by the dr. Her level became normal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hontz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality works well
customer_reviews.text: I like all Nature Made products. They're of good quality. I take magnesium to help me sleep. And overall health. This works great!
customer_reviews.author: CBE

product_meta.title: Nature Made Magnesium Oxide 250 mg Tablets, 100 Count for Nutrition Support (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Trust Nature Made for your magnesium supplement needs. Magnesium is an essential mineral that participates in more than 300 reactions in the body and helps support nerve, muscle and heart function.† Magnesium also supports healthy bones and teeth and is essential in converting food into cellular energy.† Made with colors derived from natural sources.
feature_bullets: For a limited time, you may receive either bottle while we update our packaging. Both have the same great product inside. Based on new FDA regulations, you may also notice a change in the unit of measure and/or daily value for certain products.
Contains a 100-day supply of Nature Made Magnesium 250 mg Tablets, 100 tablets per bottle.
Essential nutrient to support nerve, muscle, heart and bone health.
Adults, take 1 tablet daily with water and a meal.
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
